fields.description: As a remember (mostly to myself): Currently, Swift-based modules use the "ti.swiftsupport" hook to inject the Swift compatibility into the build settings. Ideally, this should be done by the SDK in 8.0.0+.
fields.summary: iOS: Swift hook should be handled by the SDK, not modules
